sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: When kind-heartedness takes shape within

sense.def: humaneness, kindliness, kind-heartedness; benevolence, Goodness as a moral value

tls:text.tls:line: When kind-heartedness takes shape within

sense.def: take shape, be formed

tls:text.tls:line: When kind-heartedness takes shape within

sense.def: WHAT IS INSIDE> internal situation

tls:text.tls:line: then that is to be called proper enactment of spiritual power [as we shall see: from Heaven];

sense.def: A 謂之B: A is called B

tls:text.tls:line: then that is to be called proper enactment of spiritual power [as we shall see: from Heaven];

sense.def: NP1 is the object of the action in NP2 禘之說

tls:text.tls:line: then that is to be called proper enactment of spiritual power [as we shall see: from Heaven];

sense.def: the highest form of virtue, true virtue, true inner power

tls:text.tls:line: then that is to be called proper enactment of spiritual power [as we shall see: from Heaven];

sense.def: enactment of N, proper enactment of N

tls:text.tls:line: when it does not take shape within [like this]

sense.def: take shape, be formed

tls:text.tls:line: this is to be called [mere external] decent behaviour.

sense.def: A 謂之B: A is called B

tls:text.tls:line: this is to be called [mere external] decent behaviour.

sense.def: proper conduct, moral behaviour; ideal of behaviour; proper conduct

tls:text.tls:line: When wisdom takes shape within

sense.def: take shape, be formed

tls:text.tls:line: that is to be called proper enactment of spiritual power;

sense.def: NP1 is the object of the action in NP2 禘之說

tls:text.tls:line: that is to be called proper enactment of spiritual power;

sense.def: enactment of N, proper enactment of N

tls:text.tls:line: when it does not take shape within [like this]

sense.def: take shape, be formed

tls:text.tls:line: that is called [mere external] decent behaviour [tout court].

sense.def: A 謂之B: A is called B

tls:text.tls:line: that is called [mere external] decent behaviour [tout court].

sense.def: proper conduct, moral behaviour; ideal of behaviour; proper conduct

tls:text.tls:line: When a sense for ritual propriety takes shape inside

sense.def: ritual propriety, the rules and principles of ritual propriety; the demands of ritual
intellect; intellectual competence, professional competence; intelligence, intellectual capacity

tls:text.tls:line: When supreme human perfection takes shape within

sense.def: quality of a sage, sageliness
be harmonious, be in harmonious good order; be concordant; be well balanced
the highest form of virtue, true virtue, true inner power

tls:text.tls:line: If the man of noble character has no serious concerns at the centre of his heart

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:text.tls:line: If the man of noble character has no serious concerns at the centre of his heart

sense.def: pertaining to what lies at the bottom of one's heart

tls:text.tls:line: If the man of noble character has no serious concerns at the centre of his heart

sense.def: (common) troubles, agonies, worries; cares

tls:text.tls:line: then he will not have any real pleasure at the centre of his heart;

sense.def: sympathy for N, delight in N

tls:text.tls:line: then he will have no deep inner tranquility;

sense.def: be at peace and secure, be safe; be at ease; find peace; be poised

tls:text.tls:line: then he will not achieve true joy.

sense.def: (of persons) feel deeply moved in the direction of harmonious delight, be full of joy; be joyfully satisfied
one's high intent; one's aspirations; one's moral aspiration, one's highest ambition; one's main tendencyBUDDH: religious aspirations
in modifying position 君子之道 [NOT: the Way of gentleman X]

tls:text.tls:line: When one's reflections are not purified one will not gain precise insight;

sense.def: be of exquisite quality, of choice quality

tls:text.tls:line: when one's reflections are not far-reaching one will not achieve one's aims;

sense.def: obtain [one's ends]> succeed, achieve one's aims; win success

tls:text.tls:line: if one does not gain one's proper shape one will not find deep stable equilibrium;

sense.def: become physically manifest, take physical shape

tls:text.tls:line: if one does not attain true joy one will remain without spiritual power.

sense.def: the highest form of virtue, true virtue, true inner power
be superior
noble companion (of the lexically determinate speaker)

tls:text.tls:line: but certainly, when I have seen him,

sense.def: beforehand; in the past

tls:text.tls:line: but certainly, when I have met him,

sense.def: get together with and meet

tls:text.tls:line: when one is not of perfect cultivation

sense.def: be extraordinarily talented; be of superior or supreme intelligence; be sage-like; be a sage

tls:text.tls:line: If one is not kind-hearted then one cannot attain supreme perfection.

sense.def: be extraordinarily talented; be of superior or supreme intelligence; be sage-like; be a sage

tls:text.tls:line: then one's heart cannot calm down.

sense.def: calm down

tls:text.tls:line: When the kind-hearted person reflects he will become refined (GD: purified),

sense.def: be of exquisite quality, of choice quality

tls:text.tls:line: when he displays jade-like features he will have attained his proper [inner] form:

sense.def: become physically manifest, take physical shape
be superior
obtain [one's ends]> succeed, achieve one's aims; win success
the worthy person
a worthy, any worthy; some worthies (with tensed predicate)
the worthy person
a worthy, any worthy; some worthies (with tensed predicate)
in modifying position 君子之道 [NOT: the Way of gentleman X]
person of excellent moral qualities
noble companion (of the lexically determinate speaker)

seg.line: In this the "light touch" is the most important thing for him.

tls:text.tls:srcline: In this the "light touch" is the most important thing for him.

sense.def: be admirable; be supreme; be best; excel; be of special importance

seg.line: is not losing track what one contemplates.

tls:text.tls:srcline: is not losing track what one contemplates.

sense.def: forget about> ignore, neglect; disregard (sometimes: the fact that S); fail to pay proper careful attention to, heed, fail to be mindful of

tls:text.tls:line: "When one is receptive for the truth one will learn of the Way of the man of noble character":

sense.def: in modifying position 君子之道 [NOT: the Way of gentleman X]

seg.line: The man of supreme perfection is such that what he has heard is firmly recorded in the ear

tls:text.tls:srcline: The man of supreme perfection is such that what he has heard is firmly recorded in the ear

sense.def: the sage (at any time or in any place)
look upwards towards something/someone (as in awe), look in front; look into the distance (LISAO 瞻前而顧後)
tears (also as grammatical subject)
intense worry

tls:text.tls:line: "Only when one is able to practise this singlemindedness can one become a man of noble character":

sense.def: become (ruler, one's own enemy etc)

tls:text.tls:line: "The man of noble character pays careful attention to the very core of his individuality":

sense.def: pay careful attention to; show special care for
the One; unity; inner unity; oneness and total concentration 得一 "attain to oneness"
the One; unity; inner unity; oneness and total concentration 得一 "attain to oneness"

seg.line: for "Heaven" is precisely this spiritual power0

tls:text.tls:srcline: for "Heaven" is precisely this spiritual power0

sense.def: emphatic/contrastive: be THAT (was the difficult part)

seg.line: the tears are like rain" SHI 27 tr. Karlgren

tls:text.tls:srcline: the tears are like rain" SHI 27 tr. Karlgren

tls:text.tls:srcline: the tears are like rain" SHI 27 tr. Karlgren

seg.line: Now when in a case of mourning

tls:text.tls:srcline: Now when in a case of mourning

sense.def: mourning; burial; funeral arrangements

seg.line: when one has a straight mourning dress and a properly aligned collar,

sense.def: hempen or sackcloth belt worn in mourning

tls:text.tls:srcline: when one has a straight mourning dress and a properly aligned collar,

sense.def: collar

seg.line: As for the "core of one's individuality"

tls:text.tls:srcline: As for the "core of one's individuality"

sense.def: limb, limbs; body as constituted by its parts

seg.line: 唯有德者，然後能金聲而玉振之。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 唯有德者，然後能金聲而玉振之。

sense.def: only under these logical conditions

tls:text.tls:line: then one can achieve neither human perfection nor true understanding.

sense.def: be extraordinarily talented; be of superior or supreme intelligence; be sage-like; be a sage

tls:text.tls:line: Perspicacity

sense.def: quality of a sage, sageliness

tls:text.tls:line: perspicacity is the archē of wisdom.

sense.def: beginning, the initial state as a dynamic state motivating what happens after that beginning; proper beginning; original cause, Greek: archē;
visual intelligence> intelligence, perspicaciousness
be extraordinarily talented; be of superior or supreme intelligence; be sage-like; be a sage
law-of-Heaven-determined course of events in this world
facial expression, countenance; sometimes non-expressive: facial complexion 顏色黯黑 "my facial complexion is all dark".
in the bottom of heart, from the bottom of one's heart; sincerely
be emotionally close to, intimate
in the bottom of heart, from the bottom of one's heart; sincerely

seg.line: Not to have any divisions in one mind,

tls:text.tls:srcline: Not to have any divisions in one mind,

sense.def: divisions

seg.line: When someone is innocent then to kill him,

tls:text.tls:srcline: When someone is innocent then to kill him,

sense.def: be innocent; be blameless

seg.line: In the choice of the noble one is free of personal bias.

tls:text.tls:srcline: In the choice of the noble one is free of personal bias.

sense.def: personal favour; favouritism
forgive (a person or a crime)
what lies at the bottom of one's heart, one's innermost sensibilities

seg.line: is expansive towards the left and right.??? ???

tls:text.tls:srcline: is expansive towards the left and right.??? ???

sense.def: outer heart ant. 中心

tls:text.tls:line: If when there is a small crime one pardons the culprit, that is "hidding".

sense.def: forgive (a person or a crime)

tls:text.tls:line: If when there is a small crime one refuses to pardon the culprit (as one should)

sense.def: forgive (a person or a crime)
assemble, collect together

tls:text.tls:line: The former is the way of a king or duke of honouring the talented;

sense.def: those who are possessed of moral worth and talent (at a certain time or in a certain place)

tls:text.tls:line: the latter is the way of a freeman of honouring the talented.

sense.def: those who are possessed of moral worth and talent (at a certain time or in a certain place)
nose
say S (as of the mind)
say S (as of the mind)
say S (as of the mind)

sense.def: sighing

sense.def: sighing; or: causing one to sigh

seg.line: and this truly is carried out from the core of one's heart,

tls:text.tls:srcline: and this truly is carried out from the core of one's heart,

sense.def: what lies at the bottom of one's heart, one's innermost sensibilities

tls:text.tls:line: If one EARNESTLY SEEKS???? one reaches the way of the man of noble character,

sense.def: in modifying position 君子之道 [NOT: the Way of gentleman X]

sense.def: nose

seg.line: One will agree without even saying yes,

tls:text.tls:srcline: One will agree without even saying yes,

sense.def: agree to do the contextually determinate thing, say yes 唯而不諾

seg.line: it is to line them up for comparison.

tls:text.tls:srcline: it is to line them up for comparison.

sense.def: juxtapose and compare as similar; make comparisons with

tls:text.tls:srcline: if one follows the nature of birds and beasts
